fullText: Of course, historical baggage comes with the heirloom furniture, as becomes all too clear in Branden Jacobs-Jenkins Appropriate, now making its jaw-dropping Broadway debut with Second Stage at the Helen Hayes Theater. It is easily the most electrifying Broadway play of 2023 — something I didn’t expect from a drama that received mixed notices when it first performed off-Broadway in 2014.

keyPhrases.quote: easily the most electrifying Broadway play of 2023
something I didn't expect from a drama that received mixed notices

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Unqualified superlatives like 'jaw-dropping' and 'most electrifying Broadway play of 2023' signal exceptional enthusiasm despite earlier mixed reception. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and positions the play as a standout in the current Broadway season, indicating a strong recommendation.
